item.description:
Hey all, let's enjoy a good meal at Minado this Saturday. Afterwards we can check out the new mall - Natick Collection or a movie

It's $17 per person before tax and drinks cost. For more information, please check www.minado.com

please let me know if you cannot make it since I am calling in
reservations, thanks for you cooperation.

Susan

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Minado & Movie (M&M)
